Condor::

Condor didn't knew if he could resist more, but he felt guilty that 
Nightlight was captured, he couldn't die before knew that Rodimus 
had fogiven him

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Condor:
> 
> With a big sfort, Condor open his com link with 
Yggdrasil "Commander 
> Yggdrasil... I... I have to speak with Rodimus... Please... after 
> you break the news... let me. speak with him... I have to 
> apologize... before.. Go"
> 
> 
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus listened to Optimus. He was out of the times.
> > > Rodimus Prime: It's a different era Optimus. Maximals, 
> Predacons, and the 
> > > Tripredacus are the main factions. Autobots and Decepticons, 
> such as the three 
> > > of us, are ancient.
> > > When optimus talked of crushing enemies, Rodimus knew 
something 
> was wrong.
> > > Rodimus Prime: Listen to yourself, Optimus. You never taught 
me 
> to "crush" 
> > > enemies. You taught me to do what was right.
> > > When Optimus mentioned Magnus, Rodimus became angered. He knew 
> it was a lie. 
> > > Magnus had been killed by him.
> > > Rodimus watched as Optimus flew off.
> > > Rodimus Prime: I guess thats it. When the three of us meet 
next, 
> you know it'll 
> > > be war.
> > > Rodimus transformes to car mode and heads back for the base.
> > > Rodimus Prime(via comm): Yggdrasil, I'm done with Optimus. 
> What's going on at 
> > > the base?
> > >  thedachande1985 <thedachande1985@y...> wrote:::Optimus Prime:
> > > 
> > >      He stood up, ready to see his old "friends".
> > >      "Welcome, Rodimus," He said, "Welcome..Hydra. I see that 
> things 
> > > have changed in my absence. But, no more worries, things will 
be 
> put 
> > > to rights.
> > >      "Which is what I have come here to discuss, All these 
> pathetic, 
> > > weak factions. Where are the Autobots and Decepticons of old? 
> From 
> > > what I have learned in the data disks, that I stole, there are 
> many 
> > > smaller factions here. The NWO? The Tripreds, even the 
Maximals 
> and 
> > > Predacons; what are all these things?
> > >      "You two are the leaders of some prominent groups, 
Rodimus, 
> you 
> > > act as though I taught you nothing," He walked over to him, 
and 
> > > placed his hand on his shoulder, as he had left his gun on a 
> ripped 
> > > apart stump. Secretly he had placed a bug on his shoulder, 
very 
> tiny, 
> > > about the size of a freckle. "Why haven't you crushed those 
that 
> seek 
> > > to rip your faction apart?"
> > >      He let go and walked to Hydra, "And you, although part of 
> you 
> > > may have killed me long ago, you have fallen from your vaunted 
> seat. 
> > > You have had to merge with the new Megatron. Galvatron not 
> enough for 
> > > you?"
> > >      Prime held Hydra's upper arm, and placed a bug on it.
> > >      Then he turned and walked away, back to where he had 
> begun. "I 
> > > have crossed galaxies to put things to right here," He bent 
down 
> to 
> > > grab his gun, which he promptly attached to his leg.
> > >      "You are both free to go," He said, then smiled at 
> Rodimus, "Oh 
> > > yes, one last thing...You both remember Magnus, right? Well, 
he 
> gave 
> > > his life to bring me back, and look at how well his wish was 
> granted!"
> > >      He transformed into his truck mode and lifted off, flying 
> right 
> > > over Rodimus's and Hydra's head.
> > > 
> > > (OOC: The bugs are simple tracers, they won't do much more 
than
